description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，汉族，中国共产党党员。曾任第十三届全国人民代表大会河北地区代表，现任河北建设集团董事长。
description.en: A Chinese politician, of Han ethnicity, and a member of the Communist Party of China. He served as a deputy from the Hebei region to the 13th National People's Congress and is the chairman of Hebei Construction Group.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的省份。
description.en: A province of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国河北省保定市下辖的县，是李宝忠的家乡。
description.en: A county under the administration of Baoding City, Hebei Province, People's Republic of China. It is the hometown of Li Baozhong.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党。
description.en: The founding and ruling political party of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 位于东亚的社会主义国家。
description.en: A socialist state in East Asia.

nodes.id: 第十三届全国人民代表大会

zh-cn: 第十三届全国人民代表大会

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的第十三届最高国家权力机关。
description.en: The 13th term of the highest state authority of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 一家位于中国河北省的建筑公司。
description.en: A construction company based in Hebei, China.
Li Baozhong is from Yixian, Hebei.

description.zh-cn: 李宝忠是中国共产党党员。
description.en: Li Baozhong is a member of the Communist Party of China.

relationships.target: 第十三届全国人民代表大会

position.zh-cn: 全国人大代表（河北地区）
position.en: Deputy to the National People's Congress (Hebei region)

description.zh-cn: 2018年2月24日，李宝忠当选为第十三届全国人民代表大会河北地区代表。
description.en: On February 24, 2018, Li Baozhong was elected as a deputy from the Hebei region to the 13th National People's Congress.

description.zh-cn: 李宝忠担任河北建设集团董事长。
description.en: Li Baozhong serves as the Chairman of Hebei Construction Group.
